import classes from './MealItem.module.css' import MealItemForm from './MealItemForm' import { useContext } from 'react' import CartContext from '../../../store/cart-context' const MealItem =(props)=>{ const cartCtx = useContext(CartContext); const price = `$${props.price.toFixed(2)}` const addToCartHandler = (amount)=>{ cartCtx.addItem({i}) } return(

  • {props.name}

    {props.description}
    {price}
    • ) } export default MealItem
